### Grouped bar chart

<div class="row">

<!-- First column for large screen --> 
<div class="col-lg-6">

```{r bar_grouped_code, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
# Loading required packages
library(unhcrthemes)
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)

# Loading data
df <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GDS-ODSSS/unhcr-dataviz-platform/master/data/comparison/bar_grouped.csv")

# Plot
ggplot(df) +
  geom_col(aes(x = asylum_application, y = fct_rev(factor(region)), fill = as.character(year)),
           position = position_dodge(0.7),
           width = 0.6) +
  scale_fill_unhcr_d(palette = "pal_unhcr") +
  labs(title = "Individual asylum applications registered by region | 2019-2020",
       x = "Number of people",
       caption = "Source: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder\n© UNHCR, The UN Refugee Agency") +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(c(0, 0.1)),
                     labels = label_number_si()) +
  theme_unhcr(grid = "X", axis = "y", axis_title = "x")
```

</div>
<!-- End First column --->

<!-- Second column for large screen -->

<section class="my-5">

### Grouped bar chart with labels

<div class="row">

<!-- First column for large screen --> 
<div class="col-lg-6">

```{r bar_grouped_label_code, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
# Loading required packages
library(unhcrthemes)
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)

# Loading data
df <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GDS-ODSSS/unhcr-dataviz-platform/master/data/comparison/bar_grouped.csv")

# Plot
ggplot(df) +
  geom_col(aes(x = asylum_application, y = fct_rev(factor(region)), fill = as.character(year)),
           position = position_dodge(width = 0.7),
           width = 0.6) +
  geom_text(aes(x = asylum_application, y = fct_rev(factor(region)),
                group = as.character(year), label = round(asylum_application / 1e3)),
            position = position_dodge(width = 0.7),
            hjust = -0.25, size = 8/.pt) +
  scale_fill_unhcr_d(palette = "pal_unhcr") +
  labs(title = "Individual asylum applications registered by region | 2019-2020",
       subtitle = "Number of people (thousand)",
       caption = "Source: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder\n© UNHCR, The UN Refugee Agency") +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(c(0, 0.1))) +
  theme_unhcr(grid = FALSE, axis = "y", axis_title = FALSE, axis_text = "y")
```

</div>
<!-- End First column --->

<!-- Second column for large screen --> 
<div class="col-lg-6">


```{r r_bar_grouped_label_chart, echo=FALSE, out.width="100%", fig.height=6.5}

  geom_text(aes(x = asylum_application, y = fct_rev(factor(region)),
                group = as.character(year), label = round(asylum_application / 1e3)),
            position = position_dodge(width = 0.7),
            hjust = -0.25, size = 11.5/.pt) +
  scale_fill_unhcr_d(palette = "pal_unhcr") +
  labs(title = "Individual asylum applications registered by region | 2019-2020",
       subtitle = "Number of people (thousand)",
       caption = "Source: UNHCR Refugee Data Finder\n© UNHCR, The UN Refugee Agency") +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(c(0, 0.1))) +
  theme_unhcr(font_size = 13, grid = FALSE, axis = "y", axis_title = FALSE, axis_text = "y")
```
